source_reference.text: A Weekend To Remember part 1: Family Life | The Noble Marriage (Video by FamilyLife)

content_summary:
Join us as we attend Family Life's Weekend To Remember. 

In this 2 part series, we bring you along for the ride as we talk life, marriage and love. 

These videos will give you a great idea of what to expect from the 3 day course that first started in 1976 and has had millions of people go through so far. 

Although we have been to numerous marriage retreats, we have never been to a Family Life event before this. You can tell from the video we were blown away by their ability to connect with marriages in all seasons and stages in a very practical, easy to understand manner.

➡️➡️The GREAT NEWS is: We reached out to Family Life and they wanted to support our viewers marriages and have generously offered to give a $100 discount to anyone who used the purchase code we share in this video!! Wow! that's a HUGE discount. Thanks Family Life! (This video is not paid for or sponsored by Family Life)
-------

Adelle + Travis are on a journey to serve your marriage & other marriages all over the globe through bringing authentic, relatable & entertaining marriage videos right to your personal device. If you are looking for inspiring and motivational videos to help you be your best self, then you are in the right place!  Travis + Adelle are transparent in sharing personal struggles they have walked through and also use the same distinctions in coaching their clients and walking couples through transformation. 

We believe that in order to have a healthy, thriving marriage, we must first be healthy, whole individuals. Most of the work we do and share on this channel is individual work. We hope you relate to yourself in the video as we share, and through watching, you are able to see and discover areas of growth for yourself. When 2 whole & healthy individuals come together, they are able share a beautiful, healthy & thriving marriage together for years to come.

We are also on a journey to interview the top thriving marriage influencers all around the world to bring their advice to you in hopes that it will impact your life the way its impacting ours. We are passionate about pouring into marriages through what we have learned in our own relationship. Our goal is to impact & make a difference in thousands of marriages. Through Youtube we are able to widely reach couples and get our message out to you, so that you can start experiencing true intimacy & love in your own relationship right away. 

On our channel we deliver daily, inspiring, & motivating videos that will support you in being your best self and best spouse you can be. We hope you will join us on this marriage movement!

Please comment below if you found value in this video & share with someone you care about!

We cover a variety of relationship & marriage topics
